title: Planetary Terrains
description: Planetary Terrains is a 3D WebGL page to illustrate the variations in terrains of several planets and moons in the Solar System.
These terrains are based on black and white heightmaps, which were processed through a C++ program and rendered in the browser with JavaScript.
This independent project helped to build on the WebGL javascript backend from the AtomicGL page and was improved on in the War Zone Tracker.
